de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection

Interface ConnectionHandshakeRetryListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Session
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSession

    public interface ConnectionHandshakeRetryListener
    Generic listener for handshake retry requests from an IM(C/V) for a specific connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void retryHandshake(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.enums.ImHandshakeRetryReasonEnum reason)
      Requests a handshake retry for a connections with the given reason.

    • Method Detail

      • retryHandshake

        void retryHandshake(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.enums.ImHandshakeRetryReasonEnum reason)
                    throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException
        Requests a handshake retry for a connections with the given reason.
        Parameters:
        reason - the reason for the request
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if handshake is not acceptable
